decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1606908-PD401; 1606908-PD402; 1701701-SU100; 1701701-SU101; received 25/05/2017; 1701701-PD101A; 1701701-PD201B; Received 05/07/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The side dormer windows hereby approved shall be finished in obscure glazing and fixed shut below a level of 1.7 metres above internal finished floor level before the development hereby approved is first occupied. These arrangements shall be permanently retained.
description: Erection of a side and rear roof extension incorporating side roof windows to the house
